divs: Sighting DetailsTwo sightings reported; Sept 28, 2011 and Feb 2 2012. Observed orange orb moving across field toward home. Stopped and hovered then moved up and became very brilliant. After it moved away observed a large triangluar structure of an object to light. Went to a different location to get better view as object was moving away but it was gone. The second sighting was again at night and of a same orange type orb but this time at a distance. It shortly moved out of sight.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Greensburg
There were no other sightings in Greensburg on or around September 28th 2011
